content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You have been given a circular path consisting of 20 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a pineapple. Moving in a clockwise direction from the pineapple, the elements on the path are an English Springer Spaniel, a snowmobile, a Tibetan Mastiff, a parallel bars, a binoculars, a fiddler crab, a goldfinch, an American black bear, a torch, a dung beetle, a tile roof, a wooden spoon, a black swan, an ear, an oboe, a paintbrush, a bubble, a baseball, and a snow leopard. Starting from the goldfinch, you move around the ring by 15 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 15 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?
